DataElement.preferredName: Consensus Clustering Parameter Set Normalize Iteration java.lang.Integer
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A method to represent the consensus across multiple runs of a clustering algorithm, to determine the number of clusters in the data, and to assess the stability of the discovered clusters. The method can also be used to represent the consensus over multiple runs of a clustering algorithm with random restart (such as K-means, model-based Bayesian clustering, SOM, etc.), so as to account for its sensitivity to the initial conditions. It also provides for a visualization tool to inspect cluster number, membership, and boundaries.:Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.:A group of things of the same kind that belong together and are so used._To make something conform to a standard.:Doing or saying again; a repeated performance._Generic value domain for a primitive java dataype that is an Integer (32-bit two's complement).
